original_text: And when they were departed from him, (for they left him in great diseases,) his own servants conspired against him for the blood of the sons of Jehoiada the priest, and slew him on his bed, and he died: and they buried him in the city of David, but they buried him not in the sepulchres of the kings.
korean_text: 요아스가 크게 부상하매 적군이 그를 버리고 간 후에 그의 신하들이 제사장 여호야다의 아들들의 피로 말미암아 반역하여 그를 그의 침상에서 쳐죽인지라 다윗 성에 장사하였으나 왕들의 묘실에는 장사하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And when they were departed from him
for they left him in great diseases
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 큰 병들에 버렸기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: his own servants conspired against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 자신의 종들이 그를 대항하여 모의하였다

sentences.original_text: for the blood of the sons of Jehoiada the priest
and slew him on his bed
and they buried him in the city of David
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그를 다윗 성에 장사하였다

sentences.original_text: but they buried him not in the sepulchres of the kings
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 그를 왕들의 무덤에 장사하지 않았다
